org.jsimpledb.kv.raft

Class RaftKVDatabase.NonLeaderRole

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jsimpledb.kv.raft.RaftKVDatabase.Role
      • org.jsimpledb.kv.raft.RaftKVDatabase.NonLeaderRole
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RaftKVDatabase.CandidateRole, RaftKVDatabase.FollowerRole
    Enclosing class:
    RaftKVDatabase

    public abstract static class RaftKVDatabase.NonLeaderRole
extends RaftKVDatabase.Role
    Support superclass for the follower and candidate roles, both of which have an election timer.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isElectionTimerRunning()
      Determine whether the election timer is running.
      void startElection()
      Force an immediate election timeout.

      • Methods inherited from class org.jsimpledb.kv.raft.RaftKVDatabase.Role

        getKVDatabase, toString

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • isElectionTimerRunning

        public boolean isElectionTimerRunning()
        Determine whether the election timer is running.

        For a follower that is not a member of its cluster, this will return false. For all other cases, this will return true.

        Returns:
        true if election timer is running

      • startElection

        public void startElection()
        Force an immediate election timeout.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if this role is no longer active or election timer is not running
